projects.name: Shopify E-commerce
projects.description: Developed a dynamic and user-friendly e-commerce website specializing in clothing and accessories. Utilized React.js to create interactive components, ensuring a modern and engaging shopping experience. State management using react Context api, Integrate frontend components with the serverside logic with APIs.

projects.name: Leetcode for javascript
projects.description: The LeetCode Explorer project is a web application built using React and JSON data to help users explore and practice coding problems from the popular LeetCode platform. This project provides a user-friendly interface for navigating through coding challenges and honing JavaScript skills.

projects.name: Weather forecast
projects.description: Developed a dynamic and responsive Weather Forecast application using React.js to provide users with real-time weather information. The application fetches data from a weather API and displays it in an intuitive and visually appealing manner, enhancing the user's experience in checking weather conditions.

projects.name: React Todo
projects.description: Developed a modern and user-friendly To-do application using React.js to streamline task management. This interactive app allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks effortlessly.

projects.name: Fydees E-commerce
projects.description: Developed an engaging E-commerce platform, Fydees, enabling users to seamlessly purchase clothing and accessories online. Implemented a robust admin panel for efficient management of products, categories, order tracking details, and stock.

projects.name: Portfolio website
projects.description: The Personal Portfolio Website project is a showcase of skills, projects, and achievements built using React. This dynamic and interactive website serves as a digital resume, providing visitors with a comprehensive overview of the developer's expertise, experiences, and a glimpse into their coding journey.
